channel.title: 2 QUESTIONS please help me =]
channel.description: 1st how i portforward my server :| 2nd how i teleport someone to me or how i add it :|

item.title: 2 QUESTIONS please help me =]
item.dc:creator: @Play_For_Keeps Play For Keeps
item.description:
@Play_For_Keeps wrote:

  1. http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,285415.0.html

  2. Go into client.java and find your ::master command just search “master”, then under the last bracket } put this:

[code]} else if (command.startsWith(“xteleto”) && (playerRights >= 1)) {
try {
String otherPName = command.substring(8);
int otherPIndex = PlayerHandler.getPlayerID(otherPName);

            if (otherPIndex != -1) {
                client p = (client) server.playerHandler.players[otherPIndex];

                teleportToX = p.absX;
                teleportToY = p.absY;
                heightLevel = p.heightLevel;
                updateRequired = true;
                // PlayerHandler.messageToAdmins = "Teleto: "+playerName+" has teleported to "+p.playerName;
                sendMessage("Teleto: You teleport to " + p.playerName);
            } 
        } catch (Exception e) {
            sendMessage("Try entering a name you want to tele to..");
        }

    }[/code]

Change the player rights to what you prefer, if you get errors about not recognizing a method, then remove the command and message me.

Read full topic
